roleset.name: cause romantic action
roleset.note: SEDUCE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls force-59-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from seduce.01-v)

role.descr: action, end state, destination, seduced into what?

example.name: seduce-v: action as PP
example.text: The paper accused him of being a leading proponent of ``peaceful evolution,'' a catch phrase to describe what China believes is the policy of [Western countries]-1 *trace*-1 to seduce socialist nations into the capitalist sphere.

example.name: seduce-v: action better left unsaid
example.text: But it is the Trinity Rep newcomer, Jonathan Fried (Zamislov , the paralegal) who is the actor to watch, whether he is hamming it up while conducting the chamber musicians or seducing his neighbor's wife (Becca Lish) by licking her bosom.

example.name: seduce-v: with arg2 proposition
example.text: Malignant spirits assisted and seduced them into committing transgression and uncleanness.
